hopobject.name: IM-002
hopobject.pname: Inti Media for Beaglebone - an expansion board for Beaglebone
hopobject.body:
Inti Media for Beaglebone. Proposed functionalities and properties: - high resolution LCD display with touch screen enabling to work with graphical user interface of the OS - size of the display 4-7 inch - TBD - Additional features available as standard or as optional add-ons will include: *GPS, Gyro, Compass, accelerometer *Speakers *HDMI - Multiple USB - user controlled LEDs and switches - footprint of approximately 5-7 inch LCD display
We would really like to hear your opinion. Please send your suggestions to info@inti-innovations.co.uk or visit our website and complete a short poll at: http://inti-innovations.co.uk/products/inti-media/inti-media-beaglebone.html
Schematics will be released under GPL once the design is completed.
hopobject.shortdesc: We have now started a new project, an expansion board for Beaglebone and would like to hear your opinion.
